description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Try your shooting skills and shoot as many monsters as you can before the countdown ends. Use the offline multiplayer (2 players) mode for more fun with a friend.  New monsters, items and levels will be available with new free updates.
